description:
One month ago, Maekawa-san received five plastic soda bottles When she confronts the man who gave them to her, he asks Maekawa-san to build plastic bottle rockets for him. After being told that he would pay 5,000 yen per rocket, Maekawa-san accepts.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: A Day Someone Ought to Remember
Dareka-san no Omoide ni Naru Hi
誰かさんの思い出になる日
